scripts.compile: yarn clean && node scripts/cli.js compile -c yToken && node scripts/cli.js compile -c priceFeed && node scripts/cli.js compile -c interestRate && node scripts/cli.js compile -c getOracle && node scripts/cli.js compile -c getInterests && node scripts/cli.js compile -c FA12 && node scripts/cli.js compile -c FA2
scripts.migrate-gra: yarn compile && node scripts/cli.js migrate --network granadanet
scripts.migrate-s: yarn compile && node scripts/cli.js migrate --network development_server
scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name my-sandbox -e flextesa_node_cors_origin='*' --detach -p 8732:20000 tqtezos/flextesa:20210602 flobox start
